entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022
